choose.otherwise: title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.sql: select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board order by bno desc;
select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board where bno = #{bno};
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update board set title = #{dto.title}, content = #{dto.content}, modiDate = now() where writer = #{writer} and bno = #{dto.bno};
update board set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where bno = #{bno};
mapper.delete: delete from board where writer = #{writer} and bno = #{bno};
mapper.update: update board set commentCnt = commentCnt + #{commentCnt} where bno = #{bno}
